version_description:
Optimized background updates
Fixed visual bugs

Enjoying Crystal? It would be great if you can leave a rating or review in the App Store!

Optimized background updates
Fixed visual bugs

Enjoying Crystal? It would be great if you can leave a rating or review in the App Store!

New features added:
Added user on-boarding screens.
Support your favourite websites by whitelisting them.
We've also included a Safari Extension for quick & easy whitelisting ;)
Also includes Acceptable Ads, an optional feature to show your support for better advertising.
Graphics have been overhauled across the app so it has a more pleasing aesthetic.
Also I rewrote the sync engine to be more efficient and less error prone.

Enjoying Crystal? It'll be great if you could leave a rating or review :)

This is only a teaser of what's to come ;)
